products.name: Dell Inspiron 15.6" Laptop - Silver (Intel Core i5 4200U / 1TB HDD / 8GB RAM / Windows 8.1)
products.shortDescription: Say hello to this perfectly powerful sidekick for everyday computing. This redesigned 15" Dell Inspiron laptop is 17% thinner than previous generations and features an Intel Core i5-4200U with 8GB RAM and multi-gesture touch pad for easy interaction. It's thin, light and versatile with Windows 8 pre-installed.

products.name: Asus MeMO FHD Pad 10.1" 16GB Android 4.2 Tablet With Intel Atom Z2560 Processor - Blue
products.shortDescription: ASUS got the memo that tablet users were looking for high operational efficiency on a versatile system. The MeMO Pad runs a dual-core processor powered by Android 4.2 to display on a vivid 10" touchscreen, capturing the best of your games, movies and media without lagging. Connect to HDTVs to enhance your display or capture 5MP photos for direct social media sharing through WiFi or Bluetooth.

products.name: Lenovo G505 15.6" Laptop - Black (AMD A8 5550M/1TB HDD/8GB RAM/Windows 8.1)
products.shortDescription: For home, school or the office, the Lenovo G505s laptop delivers solid performance and features. It's powered by an AMD A8 processor with 8GB RAM for smooth multitasking, and comes with a 1TB hard drive for storing everything you need. With an AccuType keyboard, this laptop makes it comfortable and accurate to type.

products.name: Linksys Smart WiFi Router (WRT1900AC)
products.shortDescription: Get the best in wireless performance with Linksys Smart Wi-Fi Router WRT1900AC. Whether you're gaming or streaming HD videos, this open source router has the speed you need to get things going fast. It also lets you set up home network connectivity that you can access and control in your home even when you're not there, and restrict your kids' access to content.

products.name: Lenovo Yoga 8" 16GB Android 4.2 Tablet with MTK MT8125 Processor - Silver
products.shortDescription: The Lenovo 8" Yoga Tablet gives you three different usage modes that will make it easier to work and play. Hold it with one hand, stand it up to enjoy movies or video chats, and lay it down for a more comfortable writing experience in tilt mode.

products.name: Lenovo S400 14" Touchscreen Laptop - Silver (Intel Corei3-3217U/500GB HDD/4GB RAM) - Eng - Refurb
products.shortDescription: Loaded with a 3rd generation Intel Core processor, 4GB RAM and a 500GB hard drive, the IdeaPad S400 Touch notebook provides the functionality and performance you need for everyday use. The 14" 10-point multi-touch display screen cooperates efficiently with Windows 8 for the ultimate interactive experience.

products.name: ASUS Desktop PC (Intel Core i5 4440S / 1TB HDD / 6GB RAM / Windows 8.1)
products.shortDescription: Work, play, shop and surf on the ASUS K30 desktop computer. Designed to handle everyday computing tasks with smooth efficiency, a quad core Intel processor drives browsers, programs, and media to perform without lags. SonicMaster technology with updated integrated graphics helps you get the most out of entertainment while a 1TB hard drive stores all your movies, music and more.

products.name: Acer Aspire E1 15.6" Laptop - Black (Intel Pentium N3520 / 500GB HDD / 8GB RAM / Windows 8.1)
products.shortDescription: The 15.6" Acer Aspire E1 laptop has the slim form and functional features you need to stay productive, entertained, and connected. It comes with an Intel Pentium processor N3520, 8GB RAM, a spacious 500GB hard drive, USB 3.0, HDMI connectivity, and tons of technology that helps boost performance for smarter multitasking.

products.name: Samsung Galaxy TabPRO 10.1" 16GB Android 4.4 Tablet With Exynos 5 Octa Processor - White
products.shortDescription: Discover the world of possibilities with the Samsung Galaxy TabPRO 10.1. Designed for all types of users, this premium tablet boasts a crystal-clear WQXGA display, fast processor, and user-friendly OS. The innovative Magazine UX platform lets you personalize your on-screen experience by organizing your favourite content and apps on a dashboard.

products.name: Asus Vivobook V500CA 15.6" Touchscreen Laptop - Black (Intel Core i3-2365M/500GB HDD/6GB RAM) - Eng
products.shortDescription: Ideal for everyday computing tasks and entertainment, the ASUS V500 laptop boasts an easy-to-carry slim design and smartphone-like responsiveness. It comes with features that make multitasking and storing data easier and more secure. Enjoy immersive visuals and fuller sounds when watching your favourite films or playing games.

products.name: HP ENVY 15.6" Laptop - Silver (Intel Core i7 4700MQ / 1TB HDD / 12GB RAM / Windows 8.1)
products.shortDescription: With a 4th generation Intel Core processor, 12GB of RAM, and a 1920 x 1080 display,  the HP Envy 15" laptop is equipped to give you maximum performance for watching movies, listening to music, and gaming. And the sleek, streamlined design is the cherry on top.

products.name: ASUS Transformer 10.1" 32GB Windows 8.1 Tablet With Intel Bay Trail Z3740 Quad-Core Processor -Black
products.shortDescription: The ASUS Transformer Book combines the computing power and functionality of a laptop with the mobile convenience of a compact tablet. This incredibly versatile device is equipped with a 10.1" multi-touch display and a practical keyboard dock, so it's perfect for work or play wherever you are. It also comes with an Intel processor, 2GB RAM, 32GB built-in storage, and Windows 8.1.

products.name: ASUS M11BB Desktop PC (AMD A8 6500 / 1TB HDD / 6GB RAM / Windows 8.1)
products.shortDescription: Surf, chat, and work from a multimedia PC designed to manage the loads of real life. The ASUS M11BB matches premium performance with excellent efficiency to optimize computing whether you're gaming, watching HD movies, or creating large data files - or all three at once. With a quad core processor and whopping 1TB hard drive, the M11BB provides the power and storage to tackle any task.

products.name: Microsoft Surface 10.6" 64GB Windows RT Tablet - Dark Titanium - English
products.shortDescription: Beyond its super-slick design, the Microsoft Surface with Windows RT is one of the hottest tablets to hit the market. It's thin and light so you can take it from the couch to the outside world without breaking a sweat and stay connected to your favourite Windows programs, friends and family, and your entire digital world.

products.name: Asus MeMO FHD Pad 10.1" 16GB Android 4.2 Tablet With Intel Atom Z2560 Processor - White
products.shortDescription: ASUS got the memo that tablet users were looking for high operational efficiency on a versatile system. The MeMO Pad runs a dual-core processor powered by Android 4.2 to display on a vivid 10" touchscreen, capturing the best of your games, movies and media without lagging. Connect to HDTVs to enhance your display or capture 5MP photos for direct social media sharing through WiFi or Bluetooth.

products.name: Acer Aspire ATC-105-EB11 Desktop PC (AMD A10-6700 / 1TB HDD / 8GB RAM / Windows 8.1)
products.shortDescription: Ideal for the family home, the Acer Aspire ATC-105-EB11 desktop computer offers everything you need to carry out your daily tasks. You won't run short of connections with this PC, from connecting to all sorts of USB devices to your TV. Multitasking will be a breeze with 8GB of RAM, and the roomy hard drive can store all your favourite content, whether it's movies, photos or other files.

products.name: ASUS Republic of Gaming 14.1" Laptop - Black (Intel Core i5-3230M / 750GB HDD / 8GB RAM) - English
products.shortDescription: The ASUS 14" G46 gaming laptop is extremely mobile and powerful with gamer-centric, high-performance features. It is fully equipped with an Intel i5 processor, 8GB RAM, Nvidia enthusiast-grade discrete graphics, a superior cooling system, and solid state storage that ensures fast responsiveness and reliability. Now you can take your games on the go without sacrificing high-end performance.

products.name: Samsung Galaxy TabPRO 8.4" 16GB Android 4.4 Tablet With Snapdragon 800 Processor - White
products.shortDescription: Discover the world of possibilities with the Samsung Galaxy TabPRO 8.4. Designed for all types of users, this premium tablet boasts a crystal-clear WQXGA display, fast processor, and user-friendly OS. The innovative Magazine UX platform lets you personalize your on-screen experience by organizing your favourite content and apps on a dashboard.

products.name: Samsung Galaxy NotePRO 12.2" 32GB Android 4.4 Tablet With Exynos 5 Octa Processor - Black
products.shortDescription: Enjoy a larger-than-life tablet experience with the Samsung Galaxy NotePRO 12.2. Boasting a crystal-clear 12.2" display, this tablet provides tons of screen real estate for watching movies, multitasking, and more. The fast eight-core processor, user-friendly OS, and advanced features help you stay productive in both work and play.

products.name: Acer Aspire E1 15.6" Touchscreen Laptop - Black (Intel Celeron N2920/500GB HDD/4GB RAM/Windows 8.1)
products.shortDescription: The 15.6" Acer Aspire E1 touchscreen laptop has the slim form and functional features you need to stay productive, entertained, and connected. It comes with an Intel Celeron N2920 processor, 4GB RAM, a spacious 500GB hard drive, USB 3.0, HDMI connectivity, and tons of technology that helps boost performance for smarter multitasking.

products.name: HP 15.6" Laptop - Black (AMD E2 3800 / 320GB HDD / 4GB RAM / Windows 8.1)
products.shortDescription: This HP 15" laptop couples simplicity and reliability to make everyday computing a breeze.  With AMD accelerated processor and 4GB of RAM, it's powered to provide an efficient performance that helps you get the job done.

products.name: Apple iPad mini 16GB With Wi-Fi - Space Grey
products.shortDescription: iPad mini features a beautiful 7.9-inch display, iSight and FaceTime cameras, the A5 chip, ultrafast wireless, and up to 10 hours of battery life*. And over 300,000 apps on the App Store made for iPad also work with iPad mini**. So it's an iPad in every way, shape, and slightly smaller form.

products.name: HP ENVY 15.6" TouchSmart Laptop - Silver (Intel Core i7 4700MQ / 1TB HDD / 16GB RAM / Windows 8.1)
products.shortDescription: With a 4th generation Intel Core processor, 16GB of RAM, and a 1920 x 1080 touchscreen display,  the HP Envy 15" TouchSmart laptop is equipped to take your entertainment experience to the max. Whether you're watching movies, gaming, or listening to music, the combination of power and intuitive technology will give you increased functionality right at your fingertips.

products.name: HP 110 Desktop PC (AMD A6-5200 / 1TB HDD / 4GB RAM / Windows 8.1)
products.shortDescription: The HP 110 sticks to the basics, providing the competitive performance and familiar, essential features you need for routine tasks like email and social networking, homework and personal finances, or casual Web browsing and online shopping. The clean modern styling makes it reliable, easy-to-use, and extremely affordable.

products.name: HP ENVY 17" TouchSmart Laptop - Silver (Intel Core i7 4700MQ / 1TB HDD / 16GB RAM / Windows 8.1)
products.shortDescription: Prepare yourself for the ultimate multimedia experience. Equipped with a 4th generation Intel Core processor, 16GB of RAM, and a 1920 x 1080 touchscreen display,  the HP Envy 17.3" laptop is loaded with the power and function you need to get the perfect balance of work and play.

products.name: Dell Inspiron 7000 Series 15.6" Laptop - Silver (Intel Core i7-4500U / 1TB HDD / Windows 8)
products.shortDescription: Powerful performance meets interactive productivity in the Dell Inspiron 7000 Series 15.6" touchscreen laptop. With an Intel Core i7 processor and 16GB RAM, this laptop effortlessly powers through intensive activities and multi-tasking. The dedicated video card brings out rich visuals, while the 15.6" touchscreen displays everything in stunning Full HD.

products.name: Acer AXC-603 Desktop PC (Intel Pentium J2900 / 1TB HDD / 4GB RAM / Windows 8.1)
products.shortDescription: With its compact design, Acer's AXC-603-EB10 laptop offers the flexibility and performance to satisfy all your home computing needs while occupying little desk space. Featuring 1TB of storage space and a powerful Intel J2900 processor, you can power through your tasks and enjoy more of your digital media and entertainment with ease.

products.name: HP Touchsmart 15.6" Laptop - Black (AMD A6 5200/500GB HDD/8GB RAM/Windows 8.1)
products.shortDescription: The intuitive and dependable 15.6" HP TouchSmart laptop combines the ease and power of a multi-touch display with gorgeous HD visuals. It's loaded with an AMD processor, 8GB RAM, and a spacious 500GB hard drive that all combine to set you up for flawless everyday computing.

products.name: Dell Venue 7" 16GB Android 4.2 Tablet With Intel Atom Processor Z2560 Processor - Silver
products.shortDescription: The Dell Venue 7 Android Tablet boasts a 7-inch HD screen perfect for surfing the web, watching videos, playing games and more. Thin and light, it comes with an Intel processor, 16GB built-in storage, WiFi and Bluetooth, plus rear- and front-facing cameras so you can capture photos and video chat with friends.

products.name: Toshiba Satellite C50 15.6" Touchscreen Laptop - Silver (AMD A4-5000/500GB HDD/4GB RAM/Windows 8)
products.shortDescription: The 15.6" Toshiba Satellite C50 laptop has the power, portability, and performance you need for all-around computing tasks. It comes with an AMD A series processor, 4GB RAM, a 500GB hard drive, a touchscreen display, convenient connectivity options and the Windows 8 operating system.

products.name: Acer Aspire ATC-605-EB16 Desktop PC (Intel Core i5 4440 / 1TB HDD / 8GB RAM / Windows 8.1)
products.shortDescription: Ideal for the family home, the Acer Aspire ATC-605-EB16 desktop computer offers everything you need to carry out your daily tasks. You won't run short of connections with this PC, from connecting to all sorts of USB devices to your TV. Multitasking will be a breeze with 8GB of RAM, and the roomy hard drive can store all your favourite content, whether it's movies, photos or other files.

products.name: Lenovo IdeaPad S415 14.0" Touchscreen Laptop - Grey (AMD A6 5200/500GB HDD/8GB RAM/Windows 8.1)
products.shortDescription: Slim and lightweight, the Lenovo IdeaPad S415 laptop can tackle your everyday tasks at home and on the go. The AMD A6 processor, 8GB RAM and a 500GB hard drive provide ample power and storage for the casual computer user, while the 14" touchscreen and Windows 8 make it fun to get interactive with the laptop.
